Portfolio

My projects

Here are the projects that are a result of my frustration of smth or my participation at hackathon events.

  • News from kindergarten app - frontend

    App that allows you to (un)subscribe to the all news that are published on the kindergarten's webpage. App with darkmode and Cypress tests.

    HTML, CSS (Tailwind), JS, Python (Flask), Cypress, CI/CD (GH Actions)

    code demo

  • News from kindergarten app - backend

    The app is checking the kindergarten's website every hour. If there is smth new it will be sent to your email box. If some document is added it is attached to the email, too.

    Python, GH Actions

    code demo
